data.prompt:
Extract comprehensive customer insights from reviews about Single Pole Rocker Switches.
The output format is JSON in English:
{
"phy": {
"<PHYSICAL>": {
"<PID>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": [ID, …]
}
}
},
"perf": {
"<PERF>": {
"<perf_id>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": {<PERF_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
},
"use": {
"<USE>": {
"<SENT>": {<USE_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
}

Definitions:
- <PID>: Unique ID for physical aspect ("phy"), starting from A. After Z, continue with AA, AB, and so on.
- <PHYSICAL>: Components or inherent physical properties of the Single Pole Rocker Switches without external interaction (e.g. dimensions, appearance, material type...)
- <DETAIL>: A self-contained detail summarized from the reviews.
- <SENT>: Sentiment polarity of the current <DETAIL> (- for negative, + for positive).
- ID: All review IDs mentioning the <DETAIL>
- <perf_id>: Unique ID for performance or functions ("perf"), starting from a. After z, continue with aa, ab, and so on.
- <PERF>: The Single Pole Rocker Switches' performance (e.g. flexibility, durability, ...) or behaviors under various conditions (e.g. temperature, force, chemicals...) without reference to any specific use case
- <PERF_REASON>: <PID> of the <PHYSICAL> explicitly mentioned as the cause of the <PERF>. Include all mentioned <PID>s. If no reason is mentioned, use "?". <PERF_REASON> and <PERF> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together (i.e. the same review ID are included at both locations)
- <USE>: The specific application, applicable object, method, tool, or environment for the product.
- <USE_REASON>: <perf_id> or <PID> causing the <USE>'s sentiment. Include all mentioned reasons, or "?" if none can be inferred. <USE_REASON> and <USE> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
- <PHYSICAL>/<PERF> and <DETAIL> MUST NOT include:
  * Generic statements without details (e.g., "good", "bad quality")
  * Issues unrelated to the product itself (e.g., "fast shipping", "delivery time")
- If a review mentions any physical aspect, related performance, or use together, extract them as separate entries under "phy," "perf," and "use," with no overlap.
- Make sure each <DETAIL> is under the most relevant <PHYSICAL> or <PERF> in the context of Single Pole Rocker Switches
- Preserve negations

Key Instructions:
- Break down reviews with multiple aspects, performances, or uses into individual entries.
- Escape special characters with backslash that could cause JSON syntax errors.
- Include only explicitly mentioned reasons, and use "?" where no reason is mentioned.

Final Checklist:
- Go through all reviews and ensure that no aspect, performance, use, or reason is omitted, even if only mentioned once.
- Review all entries to ensure proper separation between aspects, performances, and uses.

Print the JSON result only.
Input format:
<ID>#<review>

[[INPUT]]
0#My Mistake. I need to update my review. I gave a one because I believed this item was missing from my order, but I had mistaken the package as batteries that came with another one of my orders. My mistake! They are very nice looking, but I'm in the middle of a remodel so I will not be connecting them for a while so I do not know how well they work yet, but they do look very nice.
1#Nice gold color. Love the look of these switches. I bought 3. They were easy to install. Would recommend.
2#These look yellow. They look yellow and not gold
3#OVERALL. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase. The item met my expectations, and the entire transaction process was smooth. I would recommend this product and seller to others, based on this positive experience.
4#Just enough glitz. At first I was disappointed. Once I installed the switch and put the cover on *magic* It's just fancy enough while still being in the background, not steal the spotlight of the wall. I will be changing all our light switches to these as our renovations continue. Goes perfect with the cover plate.
5#Sleek look, function well, resist fingerprints. I have a house full of boys on most days and they are somehow always covered in grease and dirt. I was concerned that with this style of light switch it would show streaks on the wider space. It doesn’t!! It is a beautiful gold color. These were easy to install and great quality for the money! I love the plug cover on the inside as these are in my bathroom. I don’t fear moisture sneaking in! Love these outlets.
6#Work very well. It’s solid construction, not flimsy at all. the color match the outlet cover. The sound when switching is clear and loud, I like this sound, some people might not like it.
7#Doesn't work. These light switch doesn't like up in dark like ots suppose to do
8#Excelente. Muy buen producto
9#Good quality. Good quality easy to install
10#Fake color. Don't even bother to buy is not even close to gold color !
11#Switches. Function great look great match my plate almost perfectly
12#EXCELLENT product. Goes well with my new brass wall switch plate
13#Outlet switch. Very good product I like it
14#Cheap Garbage. The brushed gold finish looks nice but the lightswitch is very cheaply made. Lasted approximately 4 months until one day I flipped my bathroom switch on and it fell off. The piece inside that controls the light also fell out so I can't use my bathroom light until I get a replacement. And it certainly won't be this one.
15#Hermosos. Encargue mas de 10 para la remodelacion completa de mis baños y quedaron perfectos con los acesorios q estoy comprando muy recomendables
16#Decent product, bad color. Did not look good with 100% brass cover plates. Too pale. Did not use for my project.
17#Me encantó. Esta super bellooo y tiene un dorado q me encanta
18#Over priced. Funny color
19#Good quality finish on paint. Easy to install and good quality finish
20#So easy to install! So easy to install! My first time and it was quick and easy!
21#Beautiful addition. The product did exactly was it was supposed to i had an electrician install but it’s beautiful
22#They look so good! I knew that they would be perfect for the space! They were so easy to install and I'm 100% happy with them.
23#its perfect color. i like the color that gives contrast to a white wall and can also make screw less plate. i wish price is cheaper. It is branded product and they changed the color. I wish company can make it more cheaper, taking fact that plain white switch even with screw less plate is less than half price
24#Contemporary Look! Exactly what I wanted. Brushed gold look to match my bath fixtures. Easy to install.
25#Awesome! Great item to use when dressing up a room. Very easy to install.
26#Wonderful! I liked this item because it was both efficient and attractive as advertised!
27#No where near gold color. These are not even close the the color gold. They are a light almond color. There is no metallic quality to them. They are just a flat tan or almond color.
28#Light Switch. Product as described, look very nice and makes a nice improvement compared to the original whites switches
29#Overall great product. Simple installation, pretty resistant to scratching (slipped with the screwdriver a few times) and the finished product looks very clean. Was hoping for more of a gold tone, but these will do nicely. Would purchase again.
30#Looks and works great. Super easy to install and looks great in our remodeled bath. Feels kind of cheap, but does the trick.
31#Just ok. So I bought these because of the good reviews, but they do not look good to me. I know it's plastic, but I was hoping it had more of a metal look. It doesn't. It just looks like cheap plastic to me. I'll keep them for now but I will be replacing them soon.
32#Nice and elegant. I really like this item. I put up new wallpaper and I accented the light switch with this and a gold cover plate. It really looks nice and elegant. So nice, I am ordering more to go in the other rooms in my home. Very easy to install. Only took me about 5 mins. to install. Looks great and worth the price.
33#Good quality. Great color, subtle gold that looks metal. Good quality product
34#one bad, one OK. Bought 2. One worked, one didn't. However bought another one as it's the only game in town for what I'm looking for.
35#Great product. Easy to install and great value for the price
36#Brown, not gold. Mediocre plastic, not metal. Wouldn’t buy again. These aren’t gold finish at all. They’re a matte brown. You may as well spray paint your own, especially for this premium price. They’re just plastic, and the rocker switch feels cheap. I wouldn’t buy again. Honestly just spray paint a higher quality switch or plate - that’s all this is.
